name: One Black Dog
description:
Since 2004 One Black Dog Media has been helping clients achieve their online goals. I founded this company in an effort to offer local businesses the chance to get a top-quality web presence, at an affordable price. Over the past decade, the company has grown to meet the needs of businesses all around, not just local! We are now a team of highly dedicated, motivated and trained professionals ready to meet all of your marketing needs.
If you ever have any questions or want to speak with me directly, please call!
